nodes.text: Lonnley Bolgar was a Human male Beachcomber smuggler leader who lived on Naboo during the Galactic Civil War. He might be related to Phranis Bolgar, a Beachcomber leader arrested by Royal Naboo Security Forces agent Jonthol Mazoon. At some point after the death of Jonthol Mazoon, a spacer killed Lonnley Bolgar.

Lonnley Bolgar appeared as a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Lonnley Bolgar was added to the game as part of the "Legacy Quest" with the release of the "Publish 25", a.k.a. the "New Game Enhancements", on November 15, 2005.
